rules.title: Game Rules
rules.subTitle: OBJECTIVE
rules.rule1: Be the first player to connect 4 of the same colored discs in a row (either vertically, horizontally, or diagonally).
rules.rule3: Red goes first in the first game.
rules.rule4: Players must alternate turns, and only one disc can be dropped in each turn.
rules.rule5: The game ends when there is a 4-in-a-row or a stalemate.
rules.rule6: The starter of the previous game goes second on the next game.
